name: Sweet Dreams: Erik's Adventure
description:
In Sweet Dreams you get fully into Erick's dream. A dangerous dream where you have to avoid and escape from the zombears that will chase you if they spot you.

Use the dreams power to find an exit and wake up from this nightmare.

---

This is a task for  class on Valentine's day in which we have to create a game in one week using only the assets provided by the Unity 2018 demo project and good Unity programing practices. These assets include all 3D models and all 2D sprites, textures and fonts. Visual effects, music and sfx are made by me.
